full_summary:
### SSC Encrypted External 8Tb SSD Drive Tender Notice

### Overview

This tender notice invites interested suppliers to submit their bids for the provision of Encrypted External 8Tb SSD Drives for the Department of National Defence located in Nova Scotia.

### Important Information

* **Tender Closing Date**: July 29, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST
* **Delivery Location**: Nova Scotia, Canada
* **Title of Service**: Encrypted External 8Tb SSD Drives
* **Procurement Category**: Goods Only
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Supplier Requirements

*   Register and submit bids electronically via the Contracting Authority's email
*   Suppliers must ensure their bids comply with all requirements outlined in the Request for Quotations document
*   Faxed and hard copy bids will not be accepted, except in exceptional circumstances, for this tender

### Evaluation Criteria

Bids will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

*   Compliance with Mandatory Criteria and Requirements
*   Technical Evaluation
*   Price

### Contact Information

To obtain more information about this tender or to submit a bid, please contact the Contracting Authority using the following contact details:

*   **Name:** Raiyane Benchekroun
*   **Email:** [N/A](mailto:N/A)
*   **Phone:** 613 324 4061
*   **Fax:** (613) 960-6007
*   **Address:** Raiyane Benchekroun, 400 Cooper Street, Ottawa, ON K1G 4A8, Canada

### Documents

Supporting documentation for this tender notice can be found at the following links:

*   English: <https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/2020F848-D029-4125-9D2F-CCE4581335A9>
*   French: <https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/fr/fil/download_public/88DF9466-0340-4BEF-B4D9-6196316F14D8>

Note that the documents are available in both English and French.

### Important Notes

These specifications are subject to the terms and conditions outlined in the Government of Canada's Standard Acquisition Contract.

The Government of Canada reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Suppliers may submit bids in either official language
